function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 as a travel risk leading to travel anxiety and altering vacation plans.","Impact":"Shifts in planned vacation behavior and increase in general anxiety affecting rational decisions and tourist behavior.","Mitigation":"Implement behavior-specific interventions to reduce the impact of travel anxiety on international tourism.","Technologies":"Digital health passports, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine for tourists.","People":"Tourists and travelers.","Owner":"Tourism organizations and government authorities."}]}
